item.title: About
item.description: Enthusiastic about crafting exceptional code and designs, I merge these interests during the day through working on C++ code, while also delving into lower-level tasks when needed. By night, I explore game engines and languages like Rust, honing my skills to create games and tools. Outside of technology, I enjoy playing volleyball as a setter and experimenting with French pastries, Indian, and Lebanese cuisine in my kitchen. LinkedIn / Github / ArtStation
